shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the audio publishing state changes.

p.codeblock: public void onAudioPublishStateChanged(String channel, STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE oldState, STREAM_PUBLISH_STATE newState, int elapseSinceLastState) {}

plentry.pd: The time elapsed (ms) from the previous state to the current state.
